page_content:
Object Detection: Faster R-CNN
•The Faster R-CNN system replaces the relatively slow selective search stage with 
a convolutional region proposal network (RPN), resulting in much faster 
inference. 
•After computing convolutional features, the RPN suggests at each coarse 
location a number of potential anchor boxes, which vary in shape and size to 
accommodate different potential objects.
•R-CNN, Fast R-CNN, and Faster R-CNN all operate on a single resolution 
convolutional feature map . To obtain better scale invariance, it would be 
preferable to operate on a range of resolutions
